answers.answer: I also been having night sweats, often waking up soaked. I donno if it's my heat or not, but I leave my window open and still doesnt help.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Feeling of something stuck in the throat can be due to severe gastritis and gastric reflux. The symptoms related to gut can also be due to inflammatory bowel condition such as ulcerative colitis, Crohn’s disease, Celiac disease (gluten intolerance), lactose intolerance or IBS or irritable bowel syndrome.Since you also have night sweats apart from inflammatory bowel conditions rule out diabetes and hypothyroidism.Please consult an internal medicine specialist or a GI doctor you are with and discuss these possibilities.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
